snippet: The former Yankee A. J. Burnett is off to a good start, both on the mound and as a leader for the surprising Pittsburgh Pirates.
abstract: Pittsburgh Pirates pitcher A J Burnett, who struggled with inconsistency during his time with the New York Yankees, is off to a good start, both on the mound and as a leader for Pittsburgh.
lead_paragraph: The former Yankee A. J. Burnett is off to a good start, both on the mound and as a leader for the surprising Pittsburgh Pirates.

headline.seo: A.J. Burnett Brings Steady Presence to Pirates
headline.main: Burnett Brings a Steady Presence to the Pirates
headline.print_headline: Wobbly as a Yankee, but Steady With the Pirates
